SourcedStatement: In South Memphis, for instance, about 96% of residents are Black, and about 91% of homes were built prior to 1978, according to the U.S. Census Bureau.
Name: U.S. Census Bureau

SourcedStatement: If your neighborhood appears in red on the above map and children under 6 live in — or regularly visit — your home, experts would encourage having your child and home tested for lead.
